pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.3:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti—
